name: Penny For Your Heart
description:
Submission for the Let's #Redefine2021 game jam! The theme is Future Jam, so I decided to make a game about robots- set in the future.

=============================================

Help a bot make friends by solving small puzzles with his trusty magnet. Can a robot make friends? Features 4 levels and cute bots!

=============================================

This is my first ever game jam project (that isn't for RPG Maker, and the one I joined was technically more of a contest), and not only that but also my first project where I worked with a partner! It's nothing objectively special, but I hope there something you find enjoyable or interesting about our game. Have fun! :)

=============================================

Note: The browser version does not perform as well as the executable- if you want to experience the best version of this game, feel free to download the actual game.
